text:
The total number of people forcibly displaced
from their homes worldwide reached 51 million

in 2013.
Refugees are often forced to live in unsanitary

Refugee camps are not designed to be permanent
homes.

The UN and private companies like IKEA are
working to create solutions to the current

IKEA’s new Better Shelter design is more
durable and energy efficient than standard

It’s hoped that new shelters will provide
safer, longer term housing for the displaced.

The Syrian civil war has claimed thousands
of lives, and displaced millions. To see exactly

where these refugees are going, check out
our video now. Don’t forget to subscribe
videos about the world, every single day.
